SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (userId, userName, userPassword, fullName, telNumber, userStatus, remark, addedDate) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userstatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addeddate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_user set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userPassword = #{userpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fullName = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telNumber = #{telnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userStatus = #{userstatus,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addedDate = #{addeddate,jdbcType=DATE} where userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userId, userName, userPassword, fullName, telNumber, userStatus, remark, addedDate from t_user
